data.name: Blood And Mead
data.detailed_description:
.
  • Unnecessarily brutal and bloody combat.
  • Unlock devastating attacks to decimate your enemies.
  • Tight meaty combat utilizing multiple weapons, shields and mead.
  • Face off against epic bosses.
.
  • Upgrade armor and weapons to become a true viking berserker.
  • Solve fun and intuitive puzzles.
  • Enjoy a captivating story filled with viking lore and shenanigans.
  • A delightful sound track filled with medieval folk flair.
.
They stole his mead, a mistake. Now he will destroy every last one of them.
Join Ulric, a retired berserker viking, on a dramatic quest for revenge that will make him a legend.
"Better to fight and fall than to live without mead." - Ulric the Bold.

data.short_description: A viking adventure filled with bone-crushingly satisfying combat. Join Ulric on an outrageous quest for revenge across a vast Norse landscape - filled with secrets, puzzles, deadly foes and boss fights. Unlock abilities, upgrade gear, drink mead and go full berserker mode!
data.reviews:
“Devastating combat, fluid game design, irreverent humour - a mighty contribution to the adventure platforming genre”
Oliver Joyce, creator of Swords and Sandals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 615 MB available space
